mapper.insert: insert into review(writer, contents, star, regDate, ref) values(#{writer}, #{contents}, #{star}, sysdate(), #{ref})
mapper.select: select ifnull(truncate(avg(star),1), 0.0) from review where ref = #{ref}
select * from review where ref = #{ref} order by num desc limit #{startRow}, 5;
select count(num) from review where ref = #{ref}
